meta.name: oauth-error-registry
meta.description: Canonical OAuth2 error code registry (RFC 6749, RFC 8628)

oauth.invalid_request.description: The request is missing a required parameter, includes an unsupported parameter value, repeats a parameter, or is otherwise malformed.

oauth.unauthorized_client.description: The client is not authorized to request an authorization code using this method.

oauth.access_denied.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request.

oauth.unsupported_response_type.description: The authorization server does not support obtaining an authorization code using this method.

oauth.invalid_scope.description: The requested scope is invalid, unknown, or malformed.

oauth.server_error.description: The authorization server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

oauth.temporarily_unavailable.description: The authorization server is currently unable to handle the request due to temporary overloading or maintenance.

oauth.invalid_grant.description: The provided authorization grant or refresh token is invalid, expired, revoked, or does not match the redirect URI.

oauth.unsupported_grant_type.description: The authorization grant type is not supported by the authorization server.

oauth.invalid_token.description: The access token is invalid, expired, or revoked.

oauth.insufficient_scope.description: The request requires higher privileges than provided by the access token.

oauth.device.authorization_pending.description: The authorization request is still pending and the user has not yet completed the authorization step.

oauth.device.slow_down.description: The client is polling too frequently and should slow down.

oauth.device.expired_token.description: The device code has expired and the device authorization session has concluded.

oauth.device.access_denied.description: The end user denied the authorization request.
